name: Aurora Energy Research Limited
goal: Aurora combines in-depth UK and EU policy experience with knowledge at the cutting edge of academic research in energy, the environment, and finance. Our directors and advisors define the company's research agenda, in consultation with clients, and their expertise shapes Aurora's forecasting models, analyses, and reports. Bright economists, engineers, and programmers from the world's best universities make up Aurora's team. We think through the economics and follow the evolution of policy meticulously, undertaking the modelling and research to make it easy for our clients to answer the questions that matter for their organisations.
interests: Climate Action, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy
euInitiatives:
Strategic Framework for the Energy Union, in particular
o Market integration
o Security of supply and coordination of capacity mechanisms
o Carbon reduction measures and further emission regulation
o Renewables regulation
